segments.text: I am struck by the woman's absolute composure at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there, drying a plate, completely unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally submerged in an expanding pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't fathom how she misses the running water sound or the feel of the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so angry to see such a blatant oversight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn that faucet off immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is practically tipping over, a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear he's going to tumble backward onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if time has slowed down, just before an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire scene is building toward an inevitable climax.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish I could intervene and prevent the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness is truly astounding to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s frustrating to witness everything unfold like this.
segments.speaker: PAR
